backend/main.mo: Canister implementing skill badge issuance, user profiles, and public badge verification with admin‑restricted minting.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata linking app features to source files, components, and requirements for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global providers, and routes for home, portfolio, badge detail, verification, and mint pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card shown when users without issuer permissions try to access the mint page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, loading, and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal requiring first‑time authenticated users to create a profile before using the app.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeCard: Badge preview card showing skill info, visuals, verified status, and navigation to badge details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component showing logo, navigation links, and a user dropdown based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, routed content outlet, footer, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Provides queries for fetching the caller’s badges and verifying a badge by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving, and checking admin status of the current user's profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIssueBadge.ts: Mutation hook to issue a new badge and invalidate relevant badge queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVerifyBadge.ts: Mutation hook to verify a badge by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BadgeDetailPage.tsx: Page displaying detailed badge information with verification, share, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerVerificationP: Provides a UI for employers to input or auto-load a badge ID and verify it via blockchain, showing success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying platform features and navigation options based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/IssuerMintPage.tsx: Allows authorized admins to mint new skill badges by submitting student principal and badge details, with validation and success feedback.
Displays a signed-in student's badge portfolio with loading, empty, and populated states.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps, principals, and badge IDs for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the UI.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural notes, image requirements, and a list of existing features for a blockchain‑based skill badge marketplace. Defines versions, roles, and UI/verification workflows.
